General.Name: Beijing Shunxin Agriculture Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Shunxin Agriculture Co.,Ltd primarily engages in the brewing and sale of liquor products under the Niu Lanshan and Ningcheng brands. It is also involved in breeding pigs under the Xiaodian brand; slaughtering and processing of meat products; animal husbandry and feed processing; processing and production of paper products; seed breeding; wholesale and retail of pre-packaged food, bulk food, etc.; and real estate development activities. In addition, the company engages in the research and development of pig breeding technology; and technology development, technical consultation, technical promotion, and technical services for animal husbandry, as well as provision of supporting services. Beijing Shunxin Agriculture Co.,Ltd was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

5.Name: Mr. De Bao  Zhang
5.Title: Deputy GM, GM-Pengcheng Food Branch & GM-Livestock Breeding Farm Store Branch
